FILMS
Song Machine Live From Kong

Release date: 8th December 2021

A theatrical rerun of a concert streamed in 2020. The movie bookended the concert with a pre-show & a behind the scenes featurette.

Contents:

Live From Kong Pre-show party with Henrie & Scully
Song Machine Live From Kong
inside Live From Kong

Z2 Comics Interview with 2D

This interview took place during Z2 Comics’ panel for Comic Con at Home.

Song Machine Unboxing
The Valley of The Pagans (Live on Animal Talking with Gary Whitta)
Song Machine Live: Pre-Show Party

Before each Song Machine Live from Kong concert, an hour-long video would feature Henrie & Scully from No Signal choosing their favourite tracks from each Gorillaz studio album; the video also featured interviews with a few members of the live band. Sadly, it currently remains unavailable via streaming services.

Jimmy Jimmy (Soundsystem Performance)
Band Promos

Several short videos were made throughout the phase with the band promoting various events & releases.
